creator: pkuzel@netbeans.com
text:
Branch: xerces_j_2 as of today

Passing to the parser a resolver, that returns InputSource with
filled systemId and nulled reader and stream, results in 
ignoring resolved systemId.

creator: pkuzel@netbeans.com
text: One month lasted, the priority increased.

I applied your patch, it works just fine. Thanks! And apologies for taking so 
long...
creator: lehors@apache.org
